channel.title: RuneElevation Banner/Logo Request For Website
channel.description:
I really need a banner made for my website.
What it should say: RuneElevation. (No Space, Make Sure The "R & E" are caps.) Dimensions are 422 x 83 px Background: Transparent
I just want it to look cool. :D I will also rep++ if I like it.
Thanks Clawz Own U

item.title: RuneElevation Banner/Logo Request For Website
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_Own_U Clawz Own U
item.description:
@Clawz_Own_U wrote:

[quote=“Slant, post:2, topic:455223”]Well you can see im new to photoshop and all so tell me what you want changed I guessed you may like these colours idk tell me some colours and I can make it look much nicer. Also do you want 3D?

[/quote]
Very Nice! Can you show me how it will look in 3D? please and thank you.
If u could make the colors red and blue?

Read full topic
